nav-tab.name: Behavior

settings-toggle.p:
Cuts down the amount of themes that clog up the themelist in the videomaker.
Keeping this off is highly suggested.
However, if you want to see everything the program has to offer, turn this on.

settings-choice.name: Video list layout
settings-choice.description: Switches the layout of the video list.

settings-choice.name: GoAnimate watermark
settings-choice.description: The Video Player has 5 choices for GoAnimate watermarks.

settings-choice.name: Aspect ratio
settings-choice.description:
The Video Maker has 2 choices for aspect ratios, 14:9 and 16:9.
By default it's set to 16:9, however you can choose to use 14:9 instead.
